mostlyText.text:
This page text is enclosed in a <[!CDATA[...]]> tag. These make sure that if you have any text with special HTML sensitive characters then they will not cause any problems. It is not compulsory to use these tags - as long as your text content is XHTML compliant. Plus a lot of visual editors add these tags around text blocks by default.
